statement: Run stage refresh logic should be explicit about which run is active to avoid completion drift when multiple runs for one experiment overlap.
rationale: Refresh logic targets the latest updated run; if multiple runs exist, counts may not align with intended run lifecycle.
keyAssumptions: Multiple runs per experiment are possible
validationCriteria: Simulated overlapping runs update correct run states
critiquePoints: Product may enforce a single run per experiment in practice
questions: Do we allow multiple active runs today?
